comment: Take them for this course. Gives great feedback. An excellent online instructor. The rubric was very clear on expectations and due dates. I would definitely recommend him. He cares about his students. Keep up with due dates. Long story short.. do your part and he does his. Easy A.
Such an easy A! All assignments take no time except quizzes, (I failed most the quizzes) and still got a high A.
Easy A class!!! There is a lot of online, busy homework to do but very doable!
It was online, I HIGHLY suggest taking wellness online it will be the best decision you ever make. Lots of stupid quizzes but nothing that takes longer than 30 mins to do. SUPER easy stuff

This is wellness online so it's hard to get a difficult professor. He sends emails reminding of upcoming due dates constantly, and he doesn't grade hard. Very straightforward, clear grading criteria and due dates, and an easy class! Would definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: He's also an elementary school PE teacher, so he's more sensitive than most professors to student's struggles.
Very clear and laid out material that is simple and easy to follow. I would recommend him for WELL 1000 (Hybrid-Online).
